Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-6021 affecting package libxml2 for versions less than 2.10.4-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-6021 affecting package libxml2 for versions less than 2.10.4-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libxml2 is earlier than 2.10.4-8, affected by CVE-2025-6021
